name: Apple Puff Pastry Tart
author: MichelleSchaffer
summary: A delicious mix of sweet and tart that will truly amaze your senses. The pastry adds dimension as well. It's like apple pie without the fork!
ingredients: 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
4  Granny Smith apples, peeled and diced
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Unroll puff pastry sheets onto a floured work surface
Cut each sheet into 6 small squares
Spread cream cheese over the center of each square
Mix apples, sugar, and cinnamon together in a separate bowl
Pinch corners of each square together
Bake in the preheated oven until puffed up and golden, 20 to 25 minutes
